name: Night Blaster
description:
Here are my three modifications:

1.  Flying Enemies can Kick Player of Ground

  • Flying enemies can hit players, and the player will be pushed off from the ground, and they will be sent flying from 100 feet or more.

2.  Aesthetics 

  • Soundtracks (for each level and menu)
  • Sound Bytes (both player/enemy firing gun, player hit, enemy death, etc.)
  • Peripherals added
  • Darker settings. Removed tutorial directional light.

3. Player Fights in the Dark Using a Flashlight

  • Through first-person, the user uses the flashlight to see enemies, checkpoints, etc.

DISCLAIMER: THIS PROJECT WAS CREATED ON A WINDOWS MACHINE. THEREFORE, THIS PROJECT WAS NOT TESTED ON MAC OS.
